subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Hasheem Thabeet had 15 points, 7 rebounds and 6 blocked shots and host Connecticut ended its seven-game losing streak against ranked teams, beating No. 13 Marquette, 89-73, on Sunday.
snippet: Hasheem Thabeet had 15 points, 7 rebounds and 6 blocked shots and host Connecticut ended its seven-game losing streak against ranked teams, beating No. 13 Marquette, 89-73, on Sunday.
